channel.title: Telling everyone when an npc is killed?
channel.description:
I have been coding for quite a while now, but stopped for a while.
I am wondering how you get the server to send everyone online a message when an npc is killed ( like dodian )
I am using a czar edit.
Any help/codes would be much appreaciated.

item.title: Telling everyone when an npc is killed?
item.dc:creator: @a-person a-person
item.description:
@a-person wrote:

Thanks, I
I’ll edit it untill it works, would rep if i could. =]

Read full topic

item.title: Telling everyone when an npc is killed?
item.dc:creator: @Rich_Dude99 Rich Dude99
item.description:
@Rich_Dude99 wrote:

This would be in Npchandler.java.

Open it, and at the bottom add something like this:

} else if (npcs[i].npcType == ####) { server.playerHandler.yell("The (NPCNAME) has been slain by " + temp.playerName + " (Level-" + temp.combatLevel + ")");

You can customize it to whatever you want, but thats a simple base…

Read full topic
